Body: How accurate is the neighbor discovery in wireless sensor networks, we are using contikios and a gateway running raspberry pi. I am investigating ways for the gateway to discover all the sensors in the network, in my case the sensors are immobile and are static.
How about you test your setup and let us know the results of your test. Did it match your expectations?

I've worked with a similar setup.  You could try using the collect-networking module.  You set the pi as the sink and all the data will automatically find its way to the sink.  So you could have all sensors sending some pairing code and when the pi receives it it has effectively detected that sensor.  http://contiki.sourceforge.net/docs/2.6/a00010.html
